user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
screen_desc: The screenshot displays a product page for the Logitech G PRO Wireless Gaming Mouse on Newegg's website. The price is listed as $78.85, marked as the lowest price in the last 30 days. Key product features include a Hero 16K Sensor, 16,000 DPI, RGB lighting, and a lightweight design with programmable buttons. There are options to add the item to the cart or buy it immediately, and a QR code for easy access to the product. The page also highlights that this is a new arrival.
